TopicTitle: Is 1.0 an uppdate or a separate purchase?

Articles.Content: Im using steam and it hasent offered me an update for the game yet. do i have to purchase 1.0 cuz im in college and i cant afford it if it is a separate purchase. Please reply asap.
then what? start the game will it start automaticly? or will i need to do it manualy

it should be automatic.

FYI: 1.0 is included in the price you paid for early access.
Version 1.0 is a free update for anyone who bought the game during early access.

> Version 1.0 is a free update for anyone who bought the game during early access.

This!
Restart steam, and/or check Library/Downloads...it may be queued up for sometime later due to server loads. Your game Library should also tell you if KSP is queued for updating.

I would also recommend making a copy of your steam install BEFORE downloading the update (in case it breaks something on you). Especially if you have any mods installed.

Cheers,
